name: Delta Force
details:
The new Delta Force game is making a comeback after 15 years.
The game features large-scale PvP battles and an extraction mode where players compete for gear and cash. It also includes a remaster of the 2003 campaign, Delta Force: Black Hawk Down

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII
details: In Civilization VII, you build and lead an empire through distinct Ages of human history. Each Age offers unique civilizations, resources, and gameplay systems. You can choose legendary leaders with unique abilities and customize their attributes to reinforce or pivot your strategy as you progress through the Ages.

name: Elden Ring
details: GAME

name: Marvel Rivals
details: Marvel Rivals is a 6v6 player-versus-player, third-person hero shooter. The game features a lineup of 33 characters from Marvel Comics and offers cross-play across all platforms. It includes destructible environments and various game modes such as Convoy, Domination, and Convergence

name: Grand Theft Auto IV
details:
Grand Theft Auto IV is the sixth main entry in the Grand Theft Auto series. The game is set in the fictional Liberty City, based on New York City, and follows the story of Eastern European war veteran Niko Bellic as he tries to escape his past while under pressure from high-profile criminals. The game features an open-world design, allowing players to freely roam Liberty City, which consists of three main islands and the neighboring state of Alderney.
The game includes both single-player and multiplayer modes, with the latter allowing up to 32 players to engage in cooperative and competitive gameplay.Two expansion packs, "The Lost and Damned" and "The Ballad of Gay Tony," were later released, featuring new plots interconnected with the main storyline.

name: Splitgate 2
details: Splitgate 2 is a 4v4 competitive multiplayer game that combines fast-paced portal gunplay with objective-based game modes. Players can teleport across the map to outsmart opponents, customize weapons, and master portaling skills. The game features three factions: Aeros, Meridian, and Sabrask, each with unique abilities.

name: Kingdom Come Deliverance
details:
Kingdom Come: Deliverance is set in the medieval Kingdom of Bohemia, an Imperial State of the Holy Roman Empire, with a focus on historically accurate content. The story takes place during a war in Bohemia in 1403, in the times of King Wenceslaus IV. Players control Henry, the son of a blacksmith, who seeks revenge for his murdered family and becomes involved in an effort to restore Bohemia's rightful king.

The game features an open-world environment, branching quest lines, and period-accurate weapons, clothing, combat techniques, and architecture. It utilizes a classless role-playing system, allowing players to customize their skills and take on various roles.

dlc.name: The Amorous Adventures of Bold Sir Hans Capon

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II
details: "Kingdom Come: Deliverance II" aims to deliver an immersive medieval experience, focusing on authenticity and a rich narrative that continues the journey from the original game.

name: Exodus
details: The game is set in a distant future where humanity has fled a dying Earth and found a new home in a hostile galaxy. Players take on the role of "The Traveler," humanity's last hope, navigating through challenges in an uncharted cosmos. The game incorporates a time dilation mechanic, where days for the player can mean decades back home, affecting the game's narrative and player choices. Matthew McConaughey voices a character in the game.

name: Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet
details: "Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet" is an uwindowsoming action-adventure game developed by Naughty Dog and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. Set in a retro-futuristic universe, the game follows Jordan A. Mun, a bounty hunter stranded on the enigmatic planet Sempiria, which has been isolated from the rest of the universe for over 600 years.

name: Elden Ring: Nightreign
details:
Cooperative Play: Designed primarily for three-player cooperative gameplay, allowing teams to face challenges together. Notably, two-player co-op is not supported, a decision made for game balance reasons.
Procedurally Generated World: Set in a procedurally generated version of Limgrave, offering varied experiences with each playthrough.
Gameplay Structure: Players have three in-game days to prepare for a final boss encounter, facing mini-bosses at the end of the first two days. The gameplay area shrinks over time, similar to mechanics found in battle royale games.
Crossplay: The game will not support cross-platform play; players can only team up with others on the same platform.

name: Ambulance Life: A Paramedic Simulator
details: "Ambulance Life: A Paramedic Simulator" is an uwindowsoming simulation game that immerses players in the life of a paramedic, emphasizing emergency response and patient care.

name: Shadow Labyrinth
details: "Shadow Labyrinth" is an uwindowsoming 2D action platformer developed by Bandai Namco Studios and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. The game offers a genre-twisting alternate take on the iconic PAC-MAN franchise, presenting a darker and more mature interpretation of the classic maze concept.

name: Borderlands 4
details:
Seamless World Exploration: The game introduces a "seamless" world design, allowing players to explore new areas without loading screens. This design enhances immersion and provides a more cohesive experience.
Set on the planet Kairos, players will encounter diverse environments distinct from previous settings, offering fresh landscapes and challenges.
New traversal tools, such as a grappling hook, are introduced, providing players with innovative ways to navigate the environment and engage in combat. 
Maintaining the series' tradition, "Borderlands 4" supports both solo play and cooperative multiplayer, allowing up to four players to team up and tackle missions together.

name: Turok: Origins
details:
Perspective Shift: The game transitions from the series' traditional first-person perspective to an over-the-shoulder third-person view, offering a fresh gameplay experience.
Cooperative Gameplay: Players can engage in both solo and cooperative multiplayer modes, teaming up to face challenges together.
Narrative: Players assume the roles of legendary Turok warriors uniting to save humanity from an aggressive alien species and total annihilation.
Enemy Encounters: The game features battles against ferocious dinosaurs and a terrifying alien threat, maintaining the series' hallmark of prehistoric and sci-fi adversaries.
Upgradable Weapons and Abilities: Players can utilize enemies' DNA to upgrade their arsenal and abilities, adding a strategic layer to combat.

name: Split Fiction
details:
"Split Fiction" is an uwindowsoming action-adventure platform game developed by Hazelight Studios and published by Electronic Arts. Known for their previous co-op titles like "It Takes Two" and "A Way Out," Hazelight continues their tradition of delivering engaging cooperative experiences.
Designed exclusively for split-screen cooperative multiplayer, requiring two players to collaborate either locally or online.
Players control Mio and Zoe, two authors trapped within their own stories, blending science fiction and fantasy elements. They must work together to escape and reclaim their creative legacies.
Each level introduces unique gameplay mechanics, ranging from taming dragons to engaging in cyber ninja combat, ensuring varied and dynamic experiences.
Allows owners of the game to invite a friend to play for free, facilitating cooperative play without requiring both players to purchase the game. 
Cross-Platform Play: Supports cross-play between PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and windows, enabling seamless cooperative experiences across different platforms.

name: Onimusha: Way of the Sword
details:
"Onimusha: Way of the Sword" is an uwindowsoming action-adventure game developed and published by Cawindowsom, marking the return of the acclaimed Onimusha series after nearly two decades.
Setting: The game is set in Edo-era Kyoto, now twisted by malevolent clouds of Malice, providing a dark and atmospheric backdrop.
Protagonist: Players follow the tale of a samurai who wields the Oni Gauntlet, a mystical artifact granting the power to slay Genma, the series' demonic adversaries.
Combat: Expect intense swordplay action, with battles against various monstrosities from the underworld known as Genma.
Exploration: Players will explore the historic Japanese capital, with each stage cloaked in mystery, danger, and intrigue.

name: Uncle Chop's Rocket Shop
details: In "Uncle Chop's Rocket Shop," players assume the role of Wilbur, a fox-like spaceship mechanic working under the watchful eye of Uncle Chop. The game combines simulation and puzzle-solving within a roguelite framework, challenging players to diagnose and repair various spaceship modules under time constraints. The gameplay emphasizes reading comprehension and problem-solving skills, with a humorous narrative and unique art style.

name: Grand Theft Auto VI
details:
The game is set in the fictional open world state of Leonida, which includes Vice City, a fictionalized version of Miami.
The story follows a criminal duo, Lucia and her male partner.

name: Counter Strike 2(CS:GO 2)
specialQuote: Largest technical leap in Counter-Strike's history.
details:
"Counter-Strike 2" is a free-to-play tactical first-person shooter developed and published by Valve Corporation. It serves as the fifth installment in the Counter-Strike series, succeeding "Counter-Strike: Global Offensive" (CS:GO).

Technical Enhancements: Built on the Source 2 engine, "Counter-Strike 2" introduces significant technical improvements, such as enhanced graphics, realistic physically-based rendering, and a new "sub-tick" server architecture that ensures more accurate synchronization with player inputs.

name: Balatro
details: In "Balatro," players build and enhance a deck of playing cards to create powerful poker hands, earning chips to overcome increasing blinds. The game introduces unique Joker cards that modify standard poker rules, allowing for varied synergies and strategies. As a roguelike, each run offers different challenges and opportunities, with unlockable bonus hands and decks enhancing replayability.

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown
specialQuote: Innovation in Accessibility Award at The Game Awards 2024
details: "Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown" revitalizes the classic series with a Metroidvania twist, offering players a blend of challenging platforming, time-manipulation abilities, and intricate level design. Players control Sargon, a young warrior with time-based powers, navigating through a mythological Persian world filled with enemies and puzzles. The game emphasizes exploration, combat, and the strategic use of time-manipulation mechanics to overcome obstacles.

name: Palworld
details: In "Palworld," players explore a vast open world inhabited by diverse creatures called "Pals." These Pals can be captured, trained, and utilized in various aspects of gameplay, including combat, farming, building, and even factory work. The game supports both single-player and multiplayer modes, with online multiplayer accommodating up to 32 players on a single server. The combination of survival mechanics, crafting, and creature management offers a distinctive experience that sets it apart from traditional monster-taming games.

name: Marathon
details: In "Marathon," players assume the roles of Runners, cybernetic mercenaries exploring the mysterious planet of Tau Ceti IV. The game emphasizes player-versus-player (PvP) combat in an extraction shooter format, where players compete to secure valuable loot and safely extract from the environment.

name: Judas
details: In "Judas," players assume the role of the titular character aboard a disintegrating starship. To survive, Judas must forge or break alliances with her worst enemies, navigating complex relationships and moral dilemmas. The game emphasizes narrative depth, player choice, and immersive storytelling, building upon the legacy of Ken Levine's previous works.

name: Manor Lords
details: Set in late 14th-century Franconia, "Manor Lords" combines deep, organic, and realistic city-building mechanics with large-scale, tactical battles. Players expand settlements, manage resources, and engage in real-time combat, all while navigating challenges like weather changes and environmental degradation. The game emphasizes historical accuracy, offering a gridless city-building experience with curved roads and free-form placement of structures.

name: Pragmata
details: Pragmata will be played mostly from a third-person perspective and heavily focus on action, similar to Cawindowsom's Devil May Cry series. The game features fights against robotic foes, dodge and melee mechanics, and futuristic firearms.   Pragmata is Cawindowsom's first original franchise in eight years and is being developed by newly hired young employees

name: Caves of Qud
details: Set in a post-apocalyptic world, "Caves of Qud" offers a richly detailed environment with deep simulation elements. Players can explore diverse biomes, interact with various factions, and experience a dynamic narrative influenced by their choices. The game is known for its complex character customization, allowing players to choose from a wide range of mutations and cybernetic implants. Its turn-based combat and procedurally generated content provide a unique experience with each playthrough.

name: TankHead
details: In "TankHead," players control Whitaker, who pilots a drone-controlled tank through the desolate ECA (Earth Contamination Area). The game emphasizes fast-paced tank combat, exploration, and survival in a post-apocalyptic world. Players can customize their tanks with various weapons, armor, and abilities to navigate the harsh environment and battle enemies.

name: The Bustling World
details: "The Bustling World" immerses players in a dynamic representation of ancient China, allowing for a wide range of activities including farming, crafting, building, exploration, and combat. Players can choose various life paths, from leading a tranquil existence to commanding armies and engaging in diplomacy. The game features a dynamic world where Nwindowss make autonomous decisions, influencing the environment and narrative. With a unique hand-painted art style and advanced physics simulations, the game aims to provide an authentic and immersive experience.

name: SchoolBoy Runaway
details: "Schoolboy Runaway - Stealth" is a 3D first-person stealth game where players assume the role of a schoolboy attempting to escape from home without alerting his parents.

name: Overwatch
details: In "Overwatch," players select from a diverse roster of heroes, each with unique abilities, and engage in objective-based team battles. The game emphasizes teamwork and strategy, with roles categorized into Damage, Tank, and Support. Matches take place across various maps inspired by real-world locations, each with specific objectives like capturing points or escorting payloads.

name: Detroit: Become Human
specialQuote: Quantic Dream's best-selling game, over 10 million units sold.
details: Set in a futuristic Detroit during 2038, the game follows three androids: Kara, who escapes her owner to explore her newfound sentience and protect a young girl; Connor, whose job is to hunt down sentient androids; and Markus, who devotes himself to releasing other androids from servitude. The player's choices affect the course and outcome of the story, leading to multiple possible endings.

name: Metel: Horror Escape
details: In "Metel: Horror Escape," players assume the role of a victim captured by a maniac and confined in a metal cage within an abandoned house in the forest. The primary objective is to escape without alerting the captor. Players must solve puzzles, hide evidence of escape attempts, and avoid detection to survive.

name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive(CS:GO)
details: In CS:GO, players join one of two teams: Terrorists or Counter-Terrorists. The game features various objective-based modes, with the most common involving Terrorists attempting to plant a bomb while Counter-Terrorists strive to prevent it, or Counter-Terrorists working to rescue hostages held by Terrorists. The game emphasizes strategic team-based action and has a high skill ceiling, contributing to its popularity in the esports scene.

name: Project Feline
details: In "Project Feline," players control Gabi, utilizing her feline agility to run, grind, and slide across various surfaces, building momentum to navigate complex 3D stages inspired by 2000s anime aesthetics.

name: Henry Stickmin: Collection (Remastered)
details: In "Stealing the Diamond," players assist the protagonist, Henry Stickmin, in attempting to steal the Tunisian Diamond from a museum. The game offers multiple choices leading to different outcomes, including three main endings: the Aggressive Way, the Undetected Way, and the Epic Way. Each choice presents humorous scenarios and various fail states, encouraging players to explore all possible paths.

name: VOIN
details: In "VOIN," players engage in fast-paced, first-person hack-and-slash combat against hordes of enemies. The game features exploration of dark fantasy realms filled with secrets and dangers, discovery of powerful gear and weapons, and battles against menacing bosses in a quest to cleanse a broken world.

name: Path of Exile 2
details: "Path of Exile 2" continues the legacy of its predecessor, offering a rich ARPG experience with a focus on deep character customization, intricate skill systems, and challenging combat. The game introduces new classes, revamped graphics, and enhanced gameplay mechanics, providing both new and returning players with a fresh yet familiar experience.

name: The Cabin Factory
specialQuote: A pleasant surprise for any horror fan.
details: In "The Cabin Factory," players assume the role of a newly hired Cabin Inspector tasked with determining whether cabins are haunted. The gameplay involves exploring cabins to detect anomalies or movements indicating a haunting. If a cabin is deemed haunted, players must exit immediately and mark it as 'danger'; if safe, they mark it as 'clear'. The game offers a short horror experience inspired by liminal spaces and psychological horror walking simulators.

name: Ballionaire
specialQuote: A creative blend of roguelike and pachinko.
details: In "Ballionaire," players build and customize pachinko-style boards, aiming to create and exploit game-breaking synergies. The game emphasizes kinetic chaos, requiring players to strategize and adapt to the physics-driven mechanics. As players progress, they encounter various challenges and opportunities to climb the ranks of the Ballionaires.

name: Among Ashes
details: "Among Ashes" offers a unique experience by embedding a first-person horror game within another. Players begin by sitting at an in-game PC, playing a horror-themed game reminiscent of early 2000s titles. As the in-game horror unfolds, strange occurrences begin happening in the player's virtual apartment, blurring the lines between the game and reality. This meta-horror approach has been praised for its creativity and immersion.

name: Coin Pusher Casino
specialQuote: A must-play for fans of arcade and coin pusher games!
details: "Coin Pusher Casino" is a digital simulation of the classic arcade coin pusher machines, offering players an engaging and nostalgic experience.

name: Mecha BREAK
specialQuote: Nvidia's AI NPCs will debut in the multiplayer Mecha Break game next year.
details: "Mecha BREAK" offers players the opportunity to engage in high-octane ground and aerial combat using customizable mechs. The game features three unique game modes and allows players to choose from diverse classes, each with distinct fighting styles. Set in a futuristic sci-fi realm, players can battle hostile mechs across treacherous terrain.

name: Path of Exile
details:
Set in the dark fantasy world of Wraeclast, players assume the role of exiles striving to survive and exact revenge on those who wronged them.

The game is renowned for its deep character customization, extensive skill tree, and complex itemization.

Players can choose from seven-character classes: Marauder, Duelist, Ranger, Shadow, Witch, Templar, and Scion, each offering unique playstyles.

"Path of Exile" features a unique league system, introducing new content and mechanics every three months.

name: Lost Ark
details:
Set in the expansive world of Arkesia, players embark on quests to find the titular Lost Ark while battling formidable foes and uncovering ancient secrets.

The game is celebrated for its dynamic combat system, diverse class options, and rich PvE and PvP content.

Players can choose from multiple classes, each with unique abilities and playstyles, allowing for personalized character development.

name: Star Citizen
specialQuote: One of the most ambitious crowdfunding projects ever.
details:
"Star Citizen" aims to provide a comprehensive space simulation experience, allowing players to:

Pilot a variety of spacecraft.

Engage in space combat.

Trade goods across the universe.

Explore diverse planets and space stations.

Participate in first-person shooter missions.

name: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth
developer: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I
details:
"Final Fantasy VII Rebirth" continues the journey of Cloud Strife and his companions as they venture beyond Midgar into a vast world filled with new challenges and narratives.

The game features an enhanced combat system, blending real-time action with strategic command-based mechanics.

Players can explore expansive environments, engage in side quests, and experience a reimagined storyline that pays homage to the original while introducing new elements.

name: Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O
details:
"Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O." elevates the original game with:

Rollback Netcode: Enhances online play for smoother matches.

4K Visuals: Updated high-resolution textures for modern displays.

Balance Updates: First game balance update in 13 years, based on the upcoming VF5US/VFes Ver2.0 update. 

Game Modes: Includes ranked, arcade, training, versus, and 16-player tournaments and leagues.

name: Sniper Elite: Resistance
details: In "Sniper Elite: Resistance," players assume the role of Harry Hawker, an agent of the Special Operations Executive (SOE), tasked with infiltrating Nazi-occupied France. The mission involves aiding the French Resistance to thwart the development of a mysterious Nazi weapon that could alter the war's outcome.

name: Dynasty Warriors: Origins
details: "Dynasty Warriors: Origins" revitalizes the series with its signature 1 vs. 1,000 combat, allowing players to engage massive armies on the battlefield. The game introduces a nameless protagonist who, suffering from amnesia, must navigate the war-torn landscape of ancient China, forging alliances and uncovering their past.

name: Assetto Corsa EVO
details: "Assetto Corsa EVO" introduces a free-roam mode featuring over 600 square miles of Lidar-scanned countryside, enhancing the open-world driving experience.

name: Star Wars Episode I: Jedi Power Battles
specialQuote: The best straight-action title on the Dreamcast.
details: Star Wars Episode I: Jedi Power Battles Remastered is an updated version of the classic action-adventure game. It features modern controls, 13 new playable characters, and enhanced graphics.

name: Synduality Echo of Ada
details: The game is set in the year 2222, following a catastrophic event known as "The Tears of the New Moon," which devastated humanity and introduced hostile creatures called Enders. Players assume the role of Drifters, piloting customizable mechs known as CRADLECOFFINs, accompanied by AI partners called Magus, to gather resources and survive in this perilous world.

name: Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector
details: Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector is a dice-driven RPG where you play as an escaped android with a malfunctioning body. You must navigate the Starward Belt, take on contracts, and build a crew while managing stress and glitches.

name: MiSide
specialQuote: Anime Horror Redefined. Over 1 Million Downloads.
details: "MiSide" offers a unique psychological horror experience that combines charming anime visuals with unsettling themes, providing players with an engaging and immersive adventure.

name: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
details: Set between the events of "Raiders of the Lost Ark" and "The Last Crusade," the game follows Indiana Jones in 1937 as he seeks to uncover the secrets of the Great Circle and prevent them from falling into the hands of sinister forces.

name: Cruel
details: "CRUEL" offers a fast-paced run-and-gun horror shooter experience with roguelike elements, providing players with a challenging and engaging adventure.

name: My Summer Car
developer: Amistech Games, primarily led by Finnish developer Johannes Rojola
specialQuote: 94% positive reviews from over 77,000 users on 9th January.
details:
"My Summer Car" is renowned for its detailed car-building mechanics and permadeath survival elements, offering a unique and challenging experience.
It offers an immersive experience where players build and maintain a car from scratch while managing survival aspects, set in the Finnish countryside during the summer of 1995.

name: Ananta
developer: Naked Rain, in collaboration with NetEase Montreal
details: "Ananta" aims to provide an immersive urban open-world experience, allowing players to explore a vibrant cityscape with a high degree of freedom. The game is currently in development, with a planned release at the end of 2025.

name: Brotato
developer: Thomas Gervraud under the studio name Blobfish.
details:
"Brotato" has received positive reviews for its engaging gameplay and has been compared to titles like "Vampire Survivors," offering a fast-paced and strategic roguelite experience.
The game features players controlling a potato character, battling through waves of enemies with various weapons and upgrades.

name: Monster Hunter Wilds
details: "Monster Hunter Wilds" aims to elevate the series with enhanced graphics, new gameplay mechanics, and expansive environments, providing both veteran hunters and newcomers with an immersive hunting experience.

name: Anger Foot
details: "Anger Foot" is notable for its unique gameplay mechanics, focusing heavily on the use of kicking as a primary combat method, providing a fresh take on the first-person shooter genre.

name: Hyper Light Breaker
details: "Hyper Light Breaker" aims to expand upon the universe established in "Hyper Light Drifter," introducing new gameplay mechanics, cooperative multiplayer, and a dynamic world that evolves with each session. Players can look forward to exploring large-scale open biomes, engaging in intense combat, and uncovering the mysteries of the Overgrowth.

name: Cinnabunny
specialQuote: Whisking Up Whimsy in Sugar Creek
details: Cinnabunny in this charming adventure, players assume the role of a bunny managing a bakery in the delightful village of Sugar Creek Burrows. The game emphasizes activities such as baking, foraging, birdwatching, and community interaction, offering both single-player and local co-op modes.

name: Avowed
details: Avowed set in the expansive world of Eora, first introduced in the "Pillars of Eternity" series, the game invites players to explore the mysterious Living Lands, a region filled with adventure and danger.

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows
details: As the fourteenth major installment in the Assassin's Creed series, it transports players to 16th-century Japan during the Azuchi-Momoyama period, a time marked by significant social upheaval and the unification of the country under powerful warlords.

name: The Blood of Dawnwalker
details: Set in 14th-century plague-ridden Europe, the game introduces players to a world where vampires have emerged from the shadows to seize power amidst humanity's struggle for survival.
